page.title: 12A FARMERS LIFE
page.content: My Dad works on the biggest farm in the area. Mr. Chamberlian owns it, but he also rents some of the land he farms. The size of the farm is twelve hundred acres. They grow wheat, barley, oil seed rape and grass. There are a hundred and sixty four steers & beef cattle. The breeds are hereford, semintel crosses and charolais. They have four helpers. The transport is two large combiners, 8, 2 wheel drive tractors, 2100 hp 4 wheel tractors, a digger, a crawler, fork lift trucks, large ploughs and drills. The sprays they use are fungicides & inscecticides.The fertilisers used are nitrogen, potash and phostrogen. The best thing about farming is to work in the open air close to nature.The worst thing about farming is planning ahead and the weather usually deciding what the farmer does.
